introduce.title: About
introduce.text_bold: Sutrix Group offers on-site digital consultancy and digital production services globally. Our strength is the end-to-end capability to design & develop global technology platforms and provide ongoing support & maintenance services.
introduce.text1: As of 2015, Sutrix Group has over 350 staff in 5 countries to service our worldwide clients.
introduce.featured_text1: Provides on-site consultants for application specifications and designing complex digital technology platforms.
introduce.featured_text2: Provides web & mobile development with ongoing support & maintenance.

consulting.title: About
consulting.text_bold: Sutrix Consulting currently has 2 offices in Copenhagen and Paris. We provide technology strategy & consulting for multinationals who requires scalable, maintainable, global digital systems. Our consultant will work with your team to gather requirements and design optimized digital solutions for maximum impact & ROI.
consulting.text1: As companies now require global apps optimized to work across devices and regions, our consultant will tailor design your application’s UX with the appropriate front-end and back-end frameworks for your business needs.
consulting.text2: We can also provide on-site consulting, training and development as needed.

solutions.title: About
solutions.text_bold: Sutrix Solutions is located in Ho Chi Minh City and Mauritius. We build web & mobile apps for the largest global brands in the Automotive, Tire, Banking, Insurance, Hospitality and Media industry.
solutions.text1: Sutrix Solutions have long term partnerships with top tier Digital Agencies and System Integrators in the US, France, Denmark, Australia, Japan & Singapore. Our multinational management team with an experienced production team and a proven software development process ensures on-time delivery with highest possible quality and within budget.
solutions.text2: We develop CMS, E-Commerce, Intranet, Mobile Apps, Social Media. We also test web & mobile apps to ensure it works seamlessly cross-platform on desktops and mobile devices.

career.title: Careers
career.sub_title: We are always looking for talent

positions_apply.title: Benefits
positions_apply.desc1: You’ll have the opportunity to work on major projects with global clients. We enable continuous learning and career development,and promote from within frequently so the opportunity for career advancement is excellent. in return, we expect that you are prepared to perform at an international standard level.
positions_apply.desc2: If you would like to join the Sutrix Media team we welcome you and encourage you to post your resume. We are always open to meeting new people and we offer competitive salaries to those that have the skills required to perform the position applied for.

leader1.name: david pugliesi
leader1.desc: David has over 20 years of experience in IT and brings his French business and management know-how to ensure the group has the right strategies and the resources are in place to execute and deliver.

leader2.name: Quan Tran
leader2.desc: Quan has over 20 years of experience in IT having worked for IBM and Canon in the US. He oversees the group partnerships, systems and processes so that the team has the tools to make great deliveries.

leader3.name: Christophe Lam
leader3.desc: Christophe has over 10 years experience in International Business Development, Account Management, Consultative sales in France and Vietnam. He oversees the group new business development and also grow the existing business accounts.

leader4.name: Khang Phan
leader4.desc: Khang oversees all productions inside Sutrix and ensures the company’s operations, processes and policies are executing effectively in support of our vision and mission. Khang has been with the group since 2004 working up through the ranks to his current role as Operations Director.

employee1.title: Project management
employee1.address: With solid methodology knowledge, our Project Managers will work closely with you to ensure your project is delivered according to spec, on time & within budget.

employee2.title: Back-end development
employee2.address: Our back-end team who is expert programming skills in PHP, .Net and Java builds and maintenance the core functional logic and operations of your web & mobile apps.

employee3.title: Quality control
employee3.address: Our QC team gets involved early in the project to prepare then handle security, performance; stress tests as well as automation testing.

employee4.title: Creative
employee4.address: Our creative team can adapt your master design to make additional designs.We can also create your master design based on your design brief.

employee5.title: Front-end development
employee5.address: Adept at HTML, JS, CSS and familiar with frameworks like Bootstrap, Backbone, AngularJS, and EmberJS, our Front end developers are responsible for a website’s user-facing code and the architecture of its immersive user experiences...

employee6.title: Mobile
employee6.address: Our Mobile developers write native code for iOS, Android & Window Phone. We can develop for both phone and tablets and also develop hybrid mobile app using PhoneGap that will work on multiple mobile platforms.

main.title: Services
main.content: We provide integrated, end-to-end digital services so all your digital technology needs are designed, developed and managed by one technology partner only.
